com.metsci.glimpse.event.mouse

Interface GlimpseMouseAllListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GlimpseMouseListener, GlimpseMouseMotionListener, GlimpseMouseWheelListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AxisMouseListener, AxisMouseListener1D, AxisMouseListener2D, DataAxisMouseListener1D, DragListener, GlimpseMouseAllAdapter, MouseDrawingExample.CustomMouseListener2D, TaggedAxisMouseListener1D, TimeAxisMouseListener1D

    public interface GlimpseMouseAllListener
extends GlimpseMouseListener, GlimpseMouseMotionListener, GlimpseMouseWheelListener
    A wrapper interface which combines the three Glimpse MouseListener interfaces.
    Author:
    ulman

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface com.metsci.glimpse.event.mouse.GlimpseMouseListener

        mouseEntered, mouseExited, mousePressed, mouseReleased

      • Methods inherited from interface com.metsci.glimpse.event.mouse.GlimpseMouseMotionListener

        mouseMoved

      • Methods inherited from interface com.metsci.glimpse.event.mouse.GlimpseMouseWheelListener
